mapper.insert: insert into products values(p_seq.nextval, #{p_imagepath}, #{p_title}, #{p_subtitle}, #{p_category}, #{p_inventory}, #{p_unit}, #{p_seller}, #{p_origin}, #{p_price}, #{p_content}, default, default)
mapper.select: select * from (select row_number() over (order by p_no desc) as rown, products.* from products where p_category=#{category}) where rown between #{start} and #{end}
select * from (select row_number() over (order by p_no desc) as rown, products.* from products) where rown between #{array[0]} and #{array[1]}
select * from (select row_number() over (order by p_no desc) as rown, products.* from products where p_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') where rown between #{start} and #{end}
